notes.title: Vue 3 is awesome

notes.title: NoteNest
notes.content: A clean note-taking app designed for simplicity and focus. It helps users organize thoughts, ideas, and tasks without unnecessary distractions.

notes.title: Design System
notes.content: Build reusable components that ensure consistency across your product. A well-structured design system improves scalability and team collaboration.
